title: Collected Stories
description: 31 stories:In a strange land --Rain --The Fall of Edward Bernard --The Pool --Mackintosh --The Happy couple --Unconquered --Before the party --Yellow streak --Vessel of wrath --Force of circumstances --Alien corn --Virtue --Bum --Treasure --The Colonel's lady --The Human Element --Footprints in the jungle --Book-bag --The Back of beyond --Mayhew --Mirage --The Letter --The Outstation --Red --Miss King --The Hairless Mexican --Giulia Lazzari --The Traitor --His Excellency --Sanatorium --
author: W. Somerset Maugham
